contents.text: Thank you for calling Mayvenn, your trusted source for premium virgin human hair and extensions.
For new orders and product information, press 1.
To place a new order with one of our stylists, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our order placement specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to place a new order for virgin hair extensions with a stylist.
I'd like to place a new order for hair extensions with one of your stylists.
I’d like to place a new order for a 20-inch virgin hair bundle with a stylist.
I need help placing a new order for hair extensions with a stylist
I’d like to place a new order with a stylist for virgin hair bundles.

contents.text: For detailed product information and care tutorials, press 2.
Please stay on the line and one of our product experts will assist you shortly.

navigationGoals: I’d like detailed product information and care instructions for your premium hair.
I need detailed product information and care tutorials for your extensions.
I need detailed technical specs and care instructions for the 18-inch raw virgin weave.
I want detailed product information and care instructions for my extensions
I need detailed product specifications and care tutorials for my extensions.

contents.text: For returns, exchanges, and updates on existing orders, press 2.
To initiate a return under our industry-leading 30-day policy, press 1.
Please hold while we process your return request.

navigationGoals: I want to initiate a return for my recent hair purchase under the 30-day policy.
I want to initiate a return for my recent order under your 30-day policy.
Please initiate an RMA for my last hair extension delivery under the 30-day return SLA.
I need to initiate a return for my recent order under the 30-day policy
I want to initiate a return for my recent hair extension order under the 30-day policy.

contents.text: To check the status of an existing return or exchange, press 2.
Thank you for your patience. A support representative will be with you shortly to update your return status.

navigationGoals: I need to check the status of my existing return or exchange.
I'm checking on the status of my return or exchange for my hair extensions.
I’m checking the RMA status for the hair extension return I filed last week.
I want to check the status of my return
I’d like an update on the current status of my return/exchange request.
